citations.narrative:
There were no records available indicating when the adult dogs received their annual parvovirus and distemper vaccines.
Licensee stated the adult dogs were last vaccinated in January 2024 for parvovirus and distemper. Failure to keep track
of all vaccines and treatments administered to the dogs makes it difficult to assess the program of veterinary care.
Licensee must record the names of all vaccines and treatments administered to dogs and the dates of administration.
Correct by April 10, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There were no records available indicating when the adult dogs received their annual parvovirus and distemper vaccines. 
Licensee stated the adult dogs were last vaccinated in January 2024 for parvovirus and distemper. Failure to keep track 
of all vaccines and treatments administered to the dogs makes it difficult to assess the program of veterinary care. 
Licensee must record the names of all vaccines and treatments administered to dogs and the dates of administration. 
Correct by April 10, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
